title: feat: add elevenmusic model with duration-based billing
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Music to our ears
gist.blurb: Added ElevenLabs Music to the audio API. Generate full tracks up to 5 minutes long with simple text prompts.
gist.summary: Integrated the ElevenLabs Music model (`elevenmusic`) into the audio API, enabling music generation with duration control and instrumental options.
gist.impact: Users can now generate custom music tracks up to 300 seconds long, billed by the second rather than by character count.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a DJ or music producer. Represents the new music generation capability. Key symbols: headphones, synthesizer, musical notes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot wearing headphones and mixing music on a retro synthesizer. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Floating musical notes and sound waves in chunky pixels. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee wearing headphones, adjusting a slider on a retro mixing console to extend a glowing lime green (#ecf874) audio waveform. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi studio vibes. Pixel text 'elevenmusic'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
